title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CSSS24-007, dated March 18, 2024 of the Commissioner of Community Services as follows: That staff be authorized to proceed as outlined in Closed Session Report CSSS24-007, dated March 18, 2024, from the Commissioner of Community Services.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAO24-002, dated March 18, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows: That staff be directed to proceed as outlined in Closed Session Report CAO24- 002, dated March 18, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer respecting an Amending Agreement.
That this meeting be adjourned at 6:09 p.m.
